meanings.definition: A protest in opposition to another protest.
meanings.sent1: During the counterprotest, people showed their disagreement with the main protest.
meanings.sent2: The counterprotesters gathered peacefully to express their different opinion.
meanings.sent3: The counterprotest added a twist to the event, making it more lively.
meanings.sent4: The clash between the protest and the counterprotest was like a battle of ideas.
meanings.sent5: The colorful banners of the counterprotest made it stand out from the crowd.

meanings.definition: To engage in a protest in opposition to another protest.
meanings.sent1: They decided to counterprotest peacefully, voicing their dissent in a respectful manner.
meanings.sent2: Many individuals chose to counterprotest instead of staying silent.
meanings.sent3: The group planned to counterprotest in a creative way, using music and art.
meanings.sent4: She felt empowered when she decided to counterprotest against the unfair policies.
meanings.sent5: The community came together to counterprotest against the construction project.
